title: 目標達成の後に・仕上げの修行！

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Yahhooo!
(Yahhooo...)
I came to the mountains with Matikanetannhauser. The reason being—
After my debut race, when we were discussing what was needed to aim for the Classic Triple Crown—

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
It's impossible as I am now, after all.
So, I'll boost my abilities drastically—gagaga~!
I'll climb up to a level that can reach the Triple Crown!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Specifically, well... In GⅠ races, I want to be able to finish within the top 5!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Thanks to the training over the past few months, my abilities have improved perfectly!
I've also achieved my goal of placing in GⅠ races!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: And now, further! To increase my chances of winning, I want to do one final training session here!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: So, ta-da!
The notebook she pulled out had a list of 'training' activities planned for today.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Waterfall meditation, high-speed mountain climbing...
And finally, full-speed running on the coast!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Unlike usual, there are some pretty tough activities where danger lurks if you let your guard down...!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: If I can get through this, I'm sure my body and mind will shed one or two layers... no, five layers!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: I'll do my best to get stronger! Yaa!
And so, the training began with plenty of spirit...

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: C-cold! I give up!

text_block_list.name: Waterfall Meditation Enthusiast A
text_block_list.text:
Hahaha, this season is tough, after all.
You're a beginner, but you came anyway—impressive.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Y-you gentlemen too! It's so cold, yet you look so cool and composed...
That's amazing!

text_block_list.name: Waterfall Meditation Enthusiast B
text_block_list.text: We're used to it, you see.

text_block_list.name: Waterfall Meditation Enthusiast B
text_block_list.text:
Over there, the sun is shining and it's a bit warmer.
Go get your body accustomed to the water.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Thank you very much...!
And the next 'training,' high-speed mountain climbing...

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: High-speed, high-speed, high-speed mountain climbing...!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Hah, haa~...!

text_block_list.name: Mountain Climbing Club Member A
text_block_list.text: Oh my, as expected of an Umamusume young lady, what amazing leg strength~.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Ah, thank you~. Ehehe.
(Gurgle~...)

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Whoa, sorry!

text_block_list.name: Mountain Climbing Club Member A
text_block_list.text: Ah, that's right. They're serving pork soup over there, feel free to have some if you'd like.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: I-Is it okay!?

text_block_list.name: Mountain Climbing Club Member A
text_block_list.text: Of course. There's plenty, so don't hold back.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Wow, yay~!
And the final 'training,' running on the sunset-lit beach...!

text_block_list.name: Girls' Volleyball Club Captain
text_block_list.text: Ina-kou~, fight-o, fight-o!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Fight-o!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Ah, Trainer!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Actually, um, I was running alone and ended up meeting the volleyball club members~.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: I was lonely, so I'm letting them join me! Ehehe~.

text_block_list.name: Girls' Volleyball Club Member
text_block_list.text: Captain, Tannhauser-chan is falling behind~!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Ah, I mustn't! Well then, see you later!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Ina-kou~,
Fio, fio!

text_block_list.name: Girls' Volleyball Club
text_block_list.text: Fio!
The training I had in mind was supposed to be much harder...
It was a day where I felt her personality—no matter where she goes, she fits right in with the group in no time.
Anyway... I managed to get results in a G1 race. At this rate, aiming for the Triple Crown shouldn't be a problem. So, with that said—
Next up, I'm finally aiming for the 'Satsuki Sho'! I want to get serious and prepare for it!
